verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%>, and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%> on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H4217>rising<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, from the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H769>Arnon<s%> unto <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon<s%>, and all the <S%H6160>plain<s%> on the <S%H4217>east<s%>:

<S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, who <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, and <S%H4910>ruled<s%> from <S%H6177>Aroer<s%>, which is upon the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H769>Arnon<s%>, and from the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%>, and from <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, even unto the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H2999>Jabbok<s%>, which is the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>;

And from the <S%H6160>plain<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of <S%H3672>Chinneroth<s%> on the <S%H4217>east<s%>, and unto the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6160>plain<s%>, even the <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> on the <S%H4217>east<s%>, the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H1020>Beth-jeshimoth<s%>; and from the <S%H8486>south<s%>, under <S%H798%H794>Ashdoth-pisgah<s%>:

¶ And the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, which was of the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H7497>giants<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%> and at <S%H154>Edrei<s%>,

And <S%H4910>reigned<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon<s%>, and in <S%H5548>Salcah<s%>, and in all <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, unto the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1651>Geshurites<s%> and the <S%H4602>Maachathites<s%>, and <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>.

Them did <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>smite<s%>: and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> it for a <S%H3425>possession<s%> unto the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%>, and the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%>, and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>.

¶ And these are the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%> which <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%>, from <S%H1171>Baal-gad<s%> in the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> even unto the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2510>Halak<s%>, that goeth <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H8165>Seir<s%>; which <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for a <S%H3425>possession<s%> according to their <S%H4256>divisions<s%>;

In the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and in the <S%H8219>valleys<s%>, and in the <S%H6160>plains<s%>, and in the <S%H794>springs<s%>, and in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and in the south <S%H5045>country<s%>; the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%>, the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, and the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%>, the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>:
¶ The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%>; the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%>, which is <S%H6654>beside<s%> <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%>;
The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%> in the <S%H5299>coast<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%>; the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%>;
